backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Report documenting implemented SEO-related features and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, and root mount point.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawling and points to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing all key site URLs with priorities and frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup defining routing, layout, navigation, and tool pages.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Stub component that renders nothing to avoid ads.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary displaying a user-friendly error UI.
frontend/src/components/tools/LoadingInd: Simple loading spinner with optional text.
frontend/src/components/tools/RelatedToo: Component showing related tool links excluding the current tool.
Reusable layout wrapper for tool inputs, actions, results, and downloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the platform's mission and available tools.
frontend/src/pages/AllToolsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all available tools with icons, descriptions, and links.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Lists all calculator tools in a grid with icons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information and email details for support and inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero section, tool categories, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ImageToolsPage.tsx: Lists available image-processing tools and displays them as clickable cards linking to their respective routes.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Renders a 404 page with a message and buttons to return home or browse all tools.
frontend/src/pages/PdfToolsPage.tsx: Shows a grid of PDF-related tools with icons and links to their corresponding feature pages.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the site's privacy policy, outlining data practices, file security, cookies, and update terms.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Presents the site's terms of service including usage rules, disclaimers, liability limits, and modification terms.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Age: Provides an age calculator where users input a birth date to compute age in years, months, and days.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Bmi: Implements a BMI calculator that evaluates BMI, category, and color-coded health ranges based on height and weight.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Emi: Calculates loan EMI, total payment, and interest from principal, rate, and tenure inputs, displaying detailed results.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Gst: Renders a GST calculator with inputs for amount, GST rate, and add/remove mode, displaying calculated GST and totals.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Loa: Provides a loan calculator that computes monthly payments, total payment, and total interest from amount, rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Per: Implements percentage and percentage-change calculators using tabbed inputs and displays computed results or errors.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Sip: Calculates SIP maturity value, invested amount, and gains based on monthly investment, return rate, and duration.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageComp: Handles image compression with adjustable quality, showing original and compressed sizes, reduction percent, and download option.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageConv: Allows uploading an image and converting it to JPEG, PNG, or WebP, with processing state and download of the converted file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageResi: React page providing an image resize tool with custom dimensions, aspect ratio option, preview of size changes, and download of the resized image.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/JpgToPngP: Simple JPG/JPEG-to-PNG converter page handling validation, conversion, error display, and PNG download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/PngToJpgP: UI page for converting PNG images to JPG with upload, progress state, conversion handling, and JPG download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/CompressPdf: Page allowing users to upload and compress PDFs, showing a demo notice, progress state, summary, and download link.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/ImageToPdfP: Tool for uploading multiple images, converting them into a PDF (demo mode), showing selected files and enabling PDF download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/JpgToPdfPag: Converter page for turning one or more JPG images into a PDF using ToolShell, with demo notice, error handling, and download support.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfMergePag: UI page for selecting multiple PDFs, merging them via mergePdfs, and downloading the merged file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfSplitPag: UI for selecting a PDF, specifying page ranges, splitting via splitPdf, and downloading the extracted pages.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfToImageP: Page that uploads a PDF, converts pages to images using pdfToImage, and downloads the resulting ZIP.
frontend/src/routes.ts: Defines all application route constants for navigation across tools and pages.
frontend/src/utils/calculators.ts: Implements utility functions for age, GST, EMI/loan, and BMI calculations with validation.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers to trigger Blob downloads and generate timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Contains formatting utilities for bytes, numbers, and computing percentage reduction.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Implements image loading, compression, resizing, and format conversions using canvas APIs.
frontend/src/utils/pdf.ts: Provides demo placeholder implementations for creating, merging, splitting, compressing, and converting PDFs using simulated delays and text-based outputs.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Defines SEO metadata for key routes and utilities to update document title and meta description dynamically.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings with several plugins.
frontend/VERIFICATION_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist for validating tool URLs, SEO metadata, and crawlability.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending SEO update requirements for the Age Calculator page.
